players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Diana.
Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "I investigated Alice last night and she is the mafioso. We must vote her out today."
Charlie: "I trust Bob's investigation. Let's vote Alice out."
You: "Bob is lying! If he were the real detective, why would he reveal himself so early and make himself a target? He's the mafia trying to frame me!"
Charlie: "Bob, if you're the real detective, why did you investigate Alice instead of Diana? That seems like an odd choice for N1. I'm reconsidering my vote."
Bob: "I investigated Diana first, but she died. So I investigated Alice. I am the detective, trust me."
You: "Bob is contradicting himself! First he said he investigated me, now he's saying he investigated Diana? The real detective can only investigate one person per night. He's clearly lying!"
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Alice, Charlie voted for Bob
Bob was arrested
